name: Healing Focus
baseDescription: Gives you a 70% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any healing spell.

name: Improved Renew
baseDescription: Increases the amount healed by your Renew spell by 10%.

name: Holy Specialization
baseDescription: Reduces the threat generated by your spells by 8%.

name: Spell Warding
baseDescription: Reduces all spell damage taken by 2%.

name: Divine Fury
baseDescription: Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire, Heal and Greater Heal spells by 0.1 sec.

name: Holy Nova
baseDescription: Causes an explosion of holy light around the caster, causing 29 to 34 Holy damage to all enemy targets within 10 yards and healing all party members within 10 yards for 54 to 63.  These effects cause no threat.

name: Blessed Recovery
baseDescription: After being struck by a melee or ranged critical hit, heal 8% of the damage taken over 6 sec.

name: Inspiration
baseDescription: Increases your target's armor by 8% for 15 sec after getting a critical effect from your Flash Heal, Heal, Greater Heal, or Prayer of Healing spell.

name: Holy Reach
baseDescription: Increases the range of your Smite and Holy Fire spells and the radius of your Prayer of Healing and Holy Nova spells by 10%.

name: Improved Healing
baseDescription: Reduces the Mana cost of your Lesser Heal, Heal, and Greater Heal spells by 5%.

name: Searing Light
baseDescription: Increases the damage of your Smite and Holy Fire spells by 10%.

name: Spirit of Redemption
baseDescription: Upon death, the priest becomes the Spirit of Redemption for 10 sec.  The Spirit of Redemption cannot move, attack, be attacked or targeted by any spells or effects.  While in this form the priest can cast any healing spell free of cost.  When the effect ends, the priest dies.

name: Spiritual Guidance
baseDescription: Increases spell damage and healing by up to 5% of your total Spirit.

name: Spiritual Healing
baseDescription: Increases the amount healed by your healing spells by 2%.

name: Lightwell
baseDescription: Creates a holy Lightwell near the priest.  Members of your raid or party can click the Lightwell to restore 800 health over 10 sec.  Being attacked cancels the effect.  Lightwell lasts for 3 min or 5 charges.
